thread.title: BRIEF-BWX Technologies Announces Proposed $400 Mln Senior Notes Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-BWX Technologies Announces Proposed $400 Mln Senior Notes Offering
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - BWX Technologies Inc:
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES ANNOUNCES PROPOSED $400.0 MILLION SENIOR NOTES OFFERING
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES INC - PLANS TO OFFER UP TO $400.0 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES INC - INTENDS TO ENTER INTO AN $800.0 MILLION SENIOR SECURED CREDIT AGREEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
